<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Luzhin: “You thanked me, even shed tears.”

Sonia: “I... I remember nothing of it.”

Luzhin: “You were eager to leave, weren’t you?”

---

<setup: mounting tension, close-up on faces>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Luzhin: “A hundred-rouble note has vanished!”

Sonia: “I didn’t take anything, I swear!”

Luzhin: “Your social position makes me suspect you.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Luzhin accuses Sonia of stealing a hundred-rouble note, expressing his suspicion despite his reluctance to do so.
